Summary: UFO observed over the Waldo Canyon burn area near the Rampart Range
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile photographing airplanes dropping fire retardant on the Waldo Canyon Fire from my house I observed a UFO on the digital camera screen. I did not see the object in the sky - just in the camera exposure. So I did not observe the object in flight. In the attached file you will see the object as it appears to be above and behind the airplane. Call me if you have any questions, or exp[lanations for this object.
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around June 26th 2012
